meanings.definition: The quality or state of being repetitive.
meanings.sent1: The repetitiveness of the song made it easy to sing along.
meanings.sent2: The repetitiveness of the task made it boring after a while.
meanings.sent3: The repetitiveness of the joke made everyone laugh every time.
meanings.sent4: The repetitiveness of the waves crashing against the shore was calming.
meanings.sent5: The repetitiveness of the alarm clock woke him up every morning.

meanings.definition: The act of repeating or doing something over and over again.
meanings.sent1: Her repetitiveness in practicing the piano paid off during the recital.
meanings.sent2: The repetitiveness of his speech annoyed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The repetitiveness of the cat chasing its tail entertained the children.
meanings.sent4: The repetitiveness of the dripping faucet echoed through the house.
meanings.sent5: The repetitiveness of the clock ticking filled the room with sound.
